
UPGRADE_CARD				-....
[REMOVE_CARD , REMOVE_TWO]              -....
TRANSFORM_CARD     			-....
 ONE_RANDOM_RARE_CARD    -....

[THREE_CARDS , THREE_RARE_CARDS] - already in pick chooice

[ONE_RARE_RELIC , RANDOM_COMMON_RELIC] 	- current_relics.append(master_relics[1])
BOSS_RELIC 				- current_relics[0] = master_relics[0]
